articles.description: NASA has shed light on an Apollo-group asteroid expected to pass Earth by a close margin today. Know its speed, size, distance of approach, and other details.

articles.title: A better DART mission for asteroid deflection? Know what NASA says - HT Tech
articles.description: The NASA DART mission demonstrated single impact style event but a new paper is offering an intriguing and probably efficient and precise method in safeguarding Earth from potential asteroid impacts.
